item.title: X-Pack Monitoring of Elasticsearch Cluster in KubeDB
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. X-Pack Monitoring with KubeDB Elasticsearch This tutorial will show you how to use X-Pack monitoring in an Elasticsearch cluster deployed with KubeDB. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using minikube.
